title: Stephens' Cornerstone Speech
quote: Our new government is founded upon... the great truth that the negro is not equal to the white man; that slavery... is his natural condition.

title: Mississippi Declaration of Secession
quote: Our position is thoroughly identified with the institution of slavery... a blow at slavery is a blow at commerce and civilization.

title: Dixiecrat Platform
quote: We stand for the segregation of the races... We oppose the elimination of segregation, the repeal of miscegenation statutes.
attribution: States' Rights Democratic Party, Birmingham Convention

title: Thurmond Switches Parties
quote: The Democratic Party has abandoned the people... [The Civil Rights Act is] the worst, most unreasonable and unconstitutional legislation that has ever been considered.
attribution: Sen. Strom Thurmond announcing switch to GOP

title: Goldwater Votes Against Civil Rights Act
quote: The Constitution does not permit any discrimination of any kind... But it is also true that the Constitution recognizes... the freedom to associate or not to associate.
attribution: Sen. Barry Goldwater, Senate floor speech explaining his vote against the Civil Rights Act

title: Southern Strategy Explained
quote: You start out in 1954 by saying 'n----r, n----r, n----r.' By 1968 you can't say that... So you say stuff like forced busing, states' rights... now you're talking about cutting taxes.
